statements: SELECT * FROM tax_records;
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_year FROM tax_records WHERE tax_liability > 5000;
SELECT * FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year = 2021 AND taxable_income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT taxable_income, tax_year, tax_liability FROM tax_records ORDER BY tax_liability DESC;
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_year, tax_liability FROM tax_records WHERE taxpayer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year = 2021 AND taxable_income >= 50000 ORDER BY tax_liability DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT taxpayer_name, SUM(tax_liability) AS total_tax_paid FROM tax_records GROUP BY taxpayer_name ORDER BY total_tax_paid DESC;
SELECT tax_year, AVG(taxable_income) AS avg_income, AVG(tax_liability) AS avg_tax FROM tax_records GROUP BY tax_year HAVING avg_tax > 1000 ORDER BY avg_income ASC;
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_year, tax_liability FROM tax_records WHERE taxable_income BETWEEN 40000 AND 80000 ORDER BY tax_year ASC, tax_liability DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(taxable_income) AS max_income, MIN(taxable_income) AS min_income FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM tax_records
SELECT income, tax_year FROM tax_records
SELECT deduction, tax_year FROM tax_records WHERE taxpayer_id = 123
SELECT tax_due, tax_paid FROM tax_calculations WHERE tax_year = 2021
SELECT record_id, tax_due, tax_paid FROM tax_calculations WHERE record_id = 456
SELECT * FROM tax_records WHERE taxpayer_id = 100 ORDER BY income DESC, deduction ASC;
SELECT record_id, tax_year, deduction FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT t.record_id, t.income, c.tax_due FROM tax_records t JOIN tax_calculations c ON t.record_id = c.record_id WHERE t.income > 50000;
SELECT t.tax_year, SUM(c.tax_paid) AS total_tax_paid FROM tax_records t JOIN tax_calculations c ON t.record_id = c.record_id GROUP BY t.tax_year ORDER BY t.tax_year;
SELECT MAX(income) AS highest_income, MIN(deduction) AS lowest_deduction FROM tax_records;
SELECT * FROM tax_records;
SELECT record_id, taxpayer_name, total_income FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM tax_calculations ORDER BY tax_amount DESC;
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_year, total_income, tax_liability, payment_status FROM tax_records WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM tax_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year > 2018
SELECT taxpayer_name, total_income FROM tax_records WHERE tax_liability > 5000
SELECT r.taxpayer_name, r.tax_year, c.taxable_income, c.tax_amount FROM tax_records r INNER JOIN tax_calculations c ON r.record_id = c.record_id
SELECT * FROM tax_records ORDER BY tax_year DESC
SELECT taxpayer_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM tax_records r INNER JOIN tax_payments p ON r.record_id = p.record_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM TaxRecords;
SELECT record_id, taxpayer_id, tax_year FROM TaxRecords WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT taxpayer_id, SUM(income) AS total_income FROM TaxRecords GROUP BY taxpayer_id;
SELECT * FROM TaxPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT tax_category, tax_rate FROM TaxRates WHERE tax_rate > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM TaxRecords WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY tax_year DESC;
SELECT taxpayer_id, SUM(tax_due) AS total_tax_due FROM TaxRecords GROUP BY taxpayer_id HAVING SUM(tax_due) > 10000;

SELECT TR.taxpayer_id, TR.tax_year, TM.payment_amount FROM TaxRecords TR INNER JOIN TaxPayments TM ON TR.record_id = TM.record_id WHERE TM.payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY TM.payment_date DESC;
SELECT TR.tax_year, TL.tax_amount, TR.income, TR.tax_due FROM TaxRecords TR LEFT JOIN TaxLiabilities TL ON TR.record_id = TL.record_id WHERE TL.tax_amount IS NULL;

SELECT TR.tax_year, TR.income, TR.tax_due, TR.tax_due * (1 + (SELECT tax_rate FROM TaxRates WHERE tax_category = 'Income Tax')) AS total_tax_with_rate FROM TaxRecords TR ORDER BY total_tax_with_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_records;
SELECT id, income, tax_due FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT name, email FROM tax_payers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT deduction_name, amount FROM deductions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT p.name AS payer_name, tp.amount AS payment_amount FROM tax_payers p JOIN tax_payments tp ON p.id = tp.payer_id WHERE tp.amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM tax_records WHERE tax_year = 2020 ORDER BY income DESC, deductions ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT tr.tax_rate, tp.amount FROM tax_payments tp JOIN tax_payers tp ON tp.payer_id = tp.id JOIN tax_rates tr ON tr.tax_year = tp.tax_year WHERE tp.payment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND tp.payment_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY tr.tax_rate DESC, tp.amount DESC
SELECT tr.tax_year, SUM(tr.tax_rate) AS total_tax_rate FROM tax_rates tr GROUP BY tr.tax_year ORDER BY tr.tax_year DESC
SELECT tp.id, tr.tax_rate, tp.amount FROM tax_payments tp LEFT JOIN tax_rates tr ON tp.payment_date = tr.tax_year ORDER BY tp.amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT tp.name, tr.tax_rate, tr.tax_year, tr.tax_rate * tp.income AS tax_amount FROM tax_payers tp JOIN tax_rates tr WHERE tr.tax_year = 2021 ORDER BY tax_amount DESC, tp.name ASC
